title: Crumpled graphene fully decorated with nickel-based nanoparticles applied in glyphosate detection
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29134-29142
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04399E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Daniel A. Gonçalves, Vitor H. N. Martins, Diogo D. Reis, Monize M. Silva, Victor H. R. Souza
This study introduces a novel approach for electrochemically detecting glyphosate in aqueous environments using crumpled graphene decorated with nickel-based nanoparticles (Ni:CG) synthesized in a single step.
